name: openchatagent
description: 开源智能客服系统 - AI优先+人工接管

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=chat-ui && npm install --workspace=chat-core && npm install --workspace=ai-service && npm install --workspace=chat-session
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ui,core,ai,session" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:session"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "core,ai,session" -c "green,yellow,magenta" "npm run start:core" "npm run start:ai" "npm run start:session"
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:ai && npm run test:session
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules chat-ui/node_modules chat-core/node_modules ai-service/node_modules chat-session/node_modules

author: OpenChatAgent Contributors
